name: restaurant-music-backend
description: Backend API for Restaurant Music Request System

scripts.migrate: node -e "require('./src/migrations/create-subscription-plans.js').up().then(() => console.log('✅ Migración completada')).catch(err => { console.error('❌ Error en migración:', err); process.exit(1); })"
scripts.migrate:down: node -e "require('./src/migrations/create-subscription-plans.js').down().then(() => console.log('✅ Migración revertida')).catch(err => { console.error('❌ Error al revertir migración:', err); process.exit(1); })"
